```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
```

```{r}
setwd("G:/My Drive/Circadian Rhythm Genes Project/35.Busco_all_genes/9.Z-linked")
omega_values = read.table("omega_values.csv", header = T, sep = ",")
```

```{r}
line_x <- 0.27
ggplot(omega_values, aes(x = Omega))+
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.01, fill = "skyblue", color = "black")+
  geom_vline(xintercept = line_x, color = "red", linetype = "dashed", size = 1)+
  geom_text(x = line_x, y = 15, label = "Period (0.27)",angle = -90, vjust = -1, color = "black")+
  labs(x = "Omega in z-linked genes (182 genes)")+
  theme_cowplot(12)

```
